sensitive_score.explanation: The F-word is used once.

description: The driver of the pickup truck exits his vehicle and confronts the driver of the dashcam car. He angrily shouts and gestures, accusing the other driver of tailgating and using profane language like 'jackass'.

sensitive_score.explanation: The F-word is used multiple times as a threat and insult.
The man makes explicit verbal threats to damage property ('break your f-ing lights out', 'f your mirror off').

description: The confrontation escalates as the truck driver verbally threatens to break the other driver's lights and mirror, using the F-word repeatedly. When told he's being recorded, he dismisses it and continues shouting.

sensitive_score.explanation: The scene shows the tail end of a verbal altercation with shouting, but the specific threats have ceased.

description: The angry truck driver continues to shout unintelligibly as he walks back to his vehicle, concluding the roadside confrontation.
In a new dashcam clip from Maryville, Tennessee, a car is driving on a residential street when a white SUV pulls out. The dashcam car follows the SUV through the neighborhood.
The dashcam car's path is blocked by two parked trucks on a narrow residential street. The driver of a white work truck gets out and walks towards the dashcam car, initiating a confrontation.
The driver of the work truck confronts the dashcam driver. The dashcam driver attempts to de-escalate the situation, calmly telling the other man that everything is fine and he can proceed.

sensitive_score.explanation: Multiple uses of the F-word, 'goddamn', and other profanity in a threatening context.
The man makes an explicit verbal threat to run over the other driver's car.

description: The confrontation escalates as the truck driver becomes aggressive, accusing the dashcam driver of brake-checking him. He uses the F-word multiple times and verbally threatens to 'run over' the dashcam driver's car.

sensitive_score.explanation: Explicit and aggressive use of the F-word and other derogatory terms like 'p**** ass'.
The man makes a veiled but clear threat of physical violence ('stomp your...ass').

description: The truck driver continues his aggressive, profane tirade, issuing more threats of violence, including telling the driver someone will 'stomp your p**** ass.' He then walks away from the car.

sensitive_score.explanation: There is no physical violence in this scene.

description: A dashcam captures the moment a car is stopped by a woman in the middle of a suburban street. The woman accuses the driver of speeding and demands to see their driver's license, initiating a verbal confrontation.

sensitive_score.explanation: There is no physical violence in this scene.
The confrontation escalates with the woman shouting, making threats to contact the driver's parents, and accusing him of intentional bad behavior.

description: The confrontation escalates as the woman aggressively argues with the driver. She threatens to contact his mother and repeatedly shouts at him, accusing him of intentionally speeding through the cul-de-sac. This heated verbal exchange contributes to the controversy score.

sensitive_score.explanation: There is no physical violence in this scene.
The woman continues to block the driver's path, demanding personal information and refusing to let him leave, effectively detaining him.

description: The woman continues her demands for the driver's license and his mother's contact information, refusing to let him leave. The driver's attempts to apologize and de-escalate are ignored, creating a tense situation where he is effectively being detained.

sensitive_score.explanation: There is no physical violence in this scene.
A man photographs the car's license plate at the woman's direction, and she threatens to use this public record to identify the driver and his family.

description: A man joins the woman, and she instructs him to photograph the car's license plate. She informs the driver they will look up the public record associated with the plate, escalating the situation by threatening to identify him and his family.

sensitive_score.explanation: There is no physical violence in this scene.
The woman continues berating the driver and threatens to file a 'report' with his family before finally letting him leave.

description: The woman continues to berate the driver, falsely accusing him of 'flying down the street.' After obtaining his license plate information, she dismisses him, stating they will file a 'report' with his family. The driver is finally able to leave, ending the confrontation.

sensitive_score.explanation: There is no violence in this scene.

description: As the driver pulls away, a text overlay appears, stating their intention to seek legal means to prevent future harassment from the woman.
